entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
